name: MORSHU RTX
description:
Play as the infamous Morshu in this all-new action-packed adventure. Fight crime, or be the crime, the world is yours, my friend.

--------------------------------------------------PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/ThrillDaWill

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/home

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/EXXeaQyX

--------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD: MOVE

LMB: PUNCH/SHOOT

RMB: AIM

1 key: default stance

2 key: Rifle(if bought from vendor)

F KEY: GRAB OBJECTS

E KEY: INTERACT

SHIFT: SPRINT

ALT: CROUCH

HOLD C KEY: FIRST PERSON

TAP C KEY: TOGGLE SHOULDERS

Z KEY: SLOW MOTION

X KEY: RAGDOLL
